name: Space Jerry
description:
Join Space Jerry, the greatest space explorer of all time, on his quest to find the mythical Chamber of Water within the Temple of the Elements. Three large obstacles hinder his path, though, the other chambers before Water.

Space Jerry is a First Person Platformer game that uses a keyboard and mouse to play. The main controls are listed, but there's a collectable in each level. If you find them, click on them!

Notes
I've noticed that some computers will take a while going from the intro to the main menu. If it freezes, give it some time, it'll get there.

The game is currently in development. I'm looking into a few things to add or improve, such as controller support. If you have any suggestions, feel free to leave them in a comment.
